basicInfo.name: Ace
basicInfo.flavor: Once, just before Ace would have received a killing blow, his enemy was sliced in two. Rumor has it that he mastered his sword after responding to its voice.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 130% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Lunar Slash
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 70% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 56% Incoming Healing Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Blossom Slash
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 140% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Physical Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Block Rate Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 3 Allies
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Reduction to 33%.
 - 3 Allies
 - Adds Effect: 2 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Unwavering Command
Passive.desc:
All Enemies
 - Inflicts Defense Reduction. [Always Active]
 - Inflicts Incoming Healing Reduction. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 135% of the caster's Physical Attack upon triggering Guts. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 24%.
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 155% of Physical Attack.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 64% Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.dislikes: Waki, Bai Jiao, rabbit meat, rudeness, weakness, war, cockroaches

basicInfo.name: Ace
basicInfo.flavor: Ace became a Lord after the deaths of his parents. He wields the Leader Sword, a blade that leaves untreatable wounds, but he has yet to master it.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 1 Turn(s)]
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 52% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Physical Vulnerability. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 100% chance to inflict Block Rate Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

 - Increases Effect: Physical Vulnerability to 10%.
